itemDescription: English rugby union player born in 1867

wikipedia_page.main: John Henry Rogers (1867 – 30 March 1922) was an English rugby union forward who played club rugby for Moseley Rugby Football Club and international rugby for England. In 1890 Rogers became one of the original members of the Barbarians Football Club.
